name: [ld45]Candy For Nothing!
description:
Avoid other thievingtrick-or-treaters and be careful of traffic as you attempt to rack up the world's largest bounty of Halloween candy! 

Controls:
Z: Knock on  doors to engage battle
X: Fire tootsie roll shotgun (if at least one   tootsie rolls collected) this will disband thieves.

Eatcandy corn during battle to recover 'bravery'

Avoid cars at all cost.

If you get too scared, you will run away and game-over. 
If an adult becomes impatient, they will kick you out with half of your candy; So run before they become angry with you.

Try to get to the end of the street with as muchcandy as possible!

THANK YOU, AND GOODNIGHT!

Made for Ludum Dare 45.
